translations: <非正式>医生，大夫（同 doctor）；<非正式>文件（同 document）

sentences.sentence: There was a big doc-forum took place in Seoul earlier this year.
sentences.translation: 今年的早些时候，首尔举行了一场大型的纪录片论坛。

sentences.sentence: What did Doc. Myer do to insure her patients understand her instructions?
sentences.translation: 迈尔医生做了什么来确保她的病人理解她的指示？
